values:
So I promised an update. I graduated college. Got a new job in October of 2006. Started dating Evelin's brother Angelo in January of 2007. Moved in with him in May of 2007. Married him Febuary of 2010. Had our first daughter Lia April of 2010 and our first son in May of 2013.

 

Can't wait to start being able to write about all the things on my mind lately and catch you all up on various things that have happened with me. I hope you'll all enjoy this new grown up Corinne!

Posted via LiveJournal app for Android.
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/55261.html
Guess who just got back into her livejournal account..... Obviously me!!! Watch out world. I have lots of catching up to do and lots to say!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/55034.html

I never use this anymore.... I only use myspace now... so if any of you still check this find me on there...


www.myspace.com/hot_ass_bitch.com
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/54584.html

I hate being so fucking in love with someone and I can't even say a thing.. I seriously kills me sometimes... I can only write it here cause nobody reads this shit... Pople always wonder why I'm single.. well it's easy when you love someone you can't have... cause I'm just not settling for anything less!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/54313.html

THIS TIME I KNOW IT'S FOR REAL 
By: Donna Summer


What would I have to do
to get you to notice me too
do I
stand in line
one of a million
admiring eyes

Walk a tightrope way up high
write your name across the sky

I'm going crazy just to let you know
you'd be amazed how much I love you so baby
when I get my hands on you I won't let go
this time I know it's for real

Should I write or call your home
shout it out with a megaphone
radio, TV news
got to find a way
to get my message to you

To say I love you with a neon sign
anything to make you mine

I'm going crazy just to let you know
if I wait too long for you I might explode baby
I've been around the block enough to know
that this time I know it's for real

Oh baby
this time, this time, this time, this time
oh baby
this time, this time

Walk a tightrope way up high
write your name across the sky

I'm going crazy just to let you know
you'd be amazed how much I love you so baby
when I get my hands on you I won't let go
this time I know it's for real

I'm going crazy just to let you know
if I waited too long for you I might explode baby
I've been around the block enough to know
that this time I know it's for real
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/54083.html

So one of my favorite boys ever e-mailed me yesterday... Marco Caban... let me give you some history...

Back like 2 1/2 years ago I met Marco at Ramapo during a snow storm... we became friends... eventually we sorta started seeing each other... nothing real serious though... but eventually he met another girl and kinda dumped me to the curb and it hurt a lot...

Fast forward to about 8 months later where he calls me out of the blue.... he was still with the same girl and I was living with my ex girlfriend at the time... so me and him became friend again.. we used to call each other like 2 times a day.. he was really like my best friend... then one day he just kinda dropped off the face of the earth... again that hurt me a lot...

So now it's like about a year after that and he e-mails me outta the blue... turns out he went into the Navy and is in Italy right now... he said he was sorry for like disappearing on me and said he misses me.... but he had his personal reasons... surprisingly I'm not mad at him... for some reason I've always really cared about this kid.. even through all the bullshit... I'm just happy to hear he's ok... I hope we can continue to keep in touch but the reality is I'm scared to really let him in because he might hurt me again.. but knowing me I will let him in because with him I've always been vulnerable.... I don't know why but that's just how it is...
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/53699.html
Matt and I are crazy ass bitches!!!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/53837.html

Well I haven't writen a real entry in forever so here it goes... 

- First of all Happy Easter to those of you who celebrate it... I don't

- As for my ankle it is doing VERY well and my cast actually comes off on Tuesday.. I'm very excited and I plan on doing LOTS of partying the next couple weeks to make up for lost time

- Work is going really well... they've finally given me like REAL work to do and they even recommended me applying for a better position but I can't because I go to school during that shift... oh well

- Someone at my job actually really likes me.. it's nice to know someone does... but I only like this person as a friend...

- I'm returning to school this Wednesday... I'm scared as hell because I've missed so much

- My Uncle Matty who's also my godfather has had cancer for quite a while.. he's terminal at this point.. my grandma called me on Saturday to tell me he now has stopped eating and driinking so I guess soon he will be gone.. I'm extremely sad but I'm trying to be strong cause I know that's what he would want me to do

- My Aunt has a brain tumor and is having surgery on the 11th to see about he options for removing it and to see exactly what it is.. it's not cancer they know already thank god.... but it's still scary

- on a better not it occured to me today that I have not cut myself in 5 years now!!! Some of you may know that I had a problem with cutting throughout middle school and high school... it's thanks to my Mom that I got better cause not once through it did she ever treat me as being crazy.. she just understood and helped me learn how to deal with things the right way

- so Tuesday when I get my cast off I'm starting a diet.. it will consist of only drinking water and only eating tuna, grilled chicken, and turkey breast.. I will also be taking Trimspa and working out on a daily basis... I'm very excited about this cause once I start losing weight I will start to feel better about myself again.. being single for over a year makes you wonder about things I guess... I love myself but hey maybe losing a few is the key.. who knows... the goal is to lose 40 pounds... but I told my mom 20 so I don't scare her..lol


so in summary I guess with the good always comes bad and as happy as I am right now abouty getting this cast off and having my life back I am sad because my family isn't doing so well... but I do have my mom and she keeps me sane... cause with this whole ankle thing I learned something that my friend Ali tried to tell me long ago... you really can't count on anyone but yourself... and unfortunately I learned I can't... but on a good note I'm not mad... I used to always be so angry about things like this... I felt let down and disappointed but I learned that not everyone is like me I guess and I will accept that... call me jaded if you would like... at least it doesn't hurt anymore..  I hope none of my friends reading this take this worng.. I truly love you all (even Matt) but I can't lie and sit here and say "Wow this person has been amazing" but it's understandable because hey we all have stuff goin on and I'm sure people can look at me and say the same thing... no hard feelings... I love you all =)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/53395.html

So over thr past week I have really bonded w/ my boss Antonio Delacruz.... he's like 40 and married and has kids and shit so don't get the wrong idea but that man just gets me.. it's nice to have real conversations w/ someone mature and it's nice to have at least someone in my life who sees the real me and appreciates me for who I am.. so Antonio even though you will never see this.... thank you!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/53226.html

Yes I like someone.... I really actually like someone.... but I haven't told this person... only cause it will fuck up the extremely great friendship we have... but this person has given me motivation for so many things and has helped me in this crappy ass time sooo much..... I will be forever grateful.... when they smile at me I can't help but smile back even if I'm in the worst mood ever... I like them even though they're short and have little fingers... lol .... but yet I will never ever tell them so =)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/52972.html

Why can't I just meet someone normal.... why do I just meet assholes and jerks... all I want is someone is enjoys laughing, doesn't take everything so seriously, doesn't over-analyze shit, and wants to be my friend..... that's all I want... 

All I'm looking for at this point in time is someone I can click with and chill with and be cool with and maybe fool around with... if it porgresses into more fine if not fine.. whatever... I don't think about shit like that

I just never realized finding this would be so difficult... we're now on 1 year and couting... kill me now... please
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/52705.html

I can't fight this feeling any longer. 
And yet I'm still afraid to let it flow. 
What started out as friendship, 
Has grown stronger. 
I only wish I had the strength to let it show. 

I tell myself that I can't hold OUT forever. 
I said there is no reason for my fear. 
Cause I feel so secure when we're together. 
You give my life direction, 
You make everything so clear. 

And even as I WANDER, 
I'm keeping you in sight. 
You're a candle in the window, 
On a cold, dark winter's night. 
And I'm getting closer than I ever THOUGHT I MIGHT. 

And I can't fight this feeling anymore. 
I've forgotten what I started fighting for. 
It's time to bring this ship into the shore, 
And throw away the oars, forever. 

Cause I can't fight this feeling anymore. 
I've forgotten what I started fighting for. 
And if I have to crawl upon the floor, 
Come crashing through your door, 
Baby, I can't fight this feeling anymore. 

My life has been such a whirlwind since I saw you. 
I've been running round in circles in my mind. 
And it always seems that I'm following you, babe, 
Cause you take me to the places, 
That alone I'd never find. 

And even as I wander, 
I'm keeping you in sight. 
You're a candle in the wind, 
On a cold, dark winter's night. 
And I'm getting closer than I ever thought I might. 

And I can't fight this feeling anymore. 
I've forgotten what I started fighting for. 
It's time to bring this ship into the shore, 
And throw away the oars, forever. 

Cause I can't fight this feeling anymore. 
I've forgotten what I started fighting for. 
And if I have to crawl upon the floor, 
Come crashing through your door, 
Baby, I can't fight this feeling anymore.



This song describes EVERYTHING I feel about you
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/52460.html

So yesterday was my 1st day back to work since I broke my ankle.. I was really nervouss about going back and stuff cause I just thought it would be so hard to do my everyday things but it turned out to be not so bad... everyone around me was very helpful especially my buddy Junior =)  ... and this sweet girl I work w/ Lisa even called me to say she was worried.. it made me feel good... I kinda miss Jake.. who woulda ever thought! But yeah I'm very happy to be back at work and everything is going well... I have gotten used to getting around on these crutches and it's no longer a HUGE hassel

I'm looking forward to tomorrow cause after work I get to chill w/ one of my FAV bitches Jenna Solomon!... yay... my fellow jew... gotta love her.. and also my friends Shane and Brandon might stop by.. it should be a good day =)

I miss my Christopher.... I hope I get to see him too... but he's busy.... but at least I get IM's from him when I walk in the door and those always make me smile
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/52073.html
I have the best Mom on the face of this earth!!!!!!!!!!!!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/51941.html

Well I'm home from surgery and all went well... I must say the nurses and doctors were sooooo good to me... they waited on me hand and foot.... just like I've always wanted... haha... I was scheduled to go in at 2:30 but really didn't get in till like 3:30... the resident doctor who helped my doctor was fucking HOT so that put me in a good.mood... so I woke up at 6:15 in recovery and mad pain but they pumped me full of morphine so it got better... the nurse then told me my Mom had just called and told her to tell me she loves me.. I just thought that was the cutest shit in the world... I was sooo hungry so I made them bring me a turkey sandwich and apple juice.... they were so proud i was able to eat so soon...lol... and as soon as I got out of recovery I peed... so in order to leave they make sure you can eat and pee.. so at that point they were ready to have me leave but i started to hurt again so I took a perkocet so they made me wait another hour... so I just chilled out in the post-op and watched TV and talked on the phone with my Mom and Aunt.. my Aunt kept bitching about how it was getting late and how my uncle was getting tired... so that hurt.. it already had hurt me that when I woke up from the surgery I had nobody there to like hold my hand... so I told my Mom to try to get in touch with Chris Ryan but she couldn't but she did get in youch with my cousin Paul who said he'd be happy to come and get me.. so he came with my Uncle Burton... how funny my gay uncle and gay cousin came...lol... not only am I a fag-hag in my social like but in my family life as well.... the fags love me.. I don't know... I was soooooo happy to see a familiar face... they put me in a great mood... 

so yeah basically the doctor put a pin, some wire, and a screw in my ankle... and the hospital gave me new crutches, some scrubs, and pillows... how cool!

So all in all in went VERY well and I am in great spirits... when I got home Jose even came over to see me... It was nice seeing him.. he's been a different person lately and I like it... he's like the Jose I originally knew and loved.... I always knew that boy was special.. I made him take one of my perkocets and it got him fucked up...lol.... but I think he liked it... 

So today my Aunt is coming over at around 10 and she's bringing me food... and sometime later Chris, Randy, AJ, and Greg are supposed to come by.... we'll see if they really do... but i hope so cause I really like those 4 boys a lot!

Oh and thanks Jenna for calling yesterday... that was so sweet of you... =)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/51637.html

Well it's the day befroe my surgery and I'm truly scared as shit... nobody really understands... but they try.... and I'd like to actually thank those people:

Greg, Jose, Jenna, Eve, Pam, Goose, Mom, AJ, Crispy, Adria, Chris Ryan (sorta)

yeah thats about it... so fuck everyone else... haha ... I must state right here how I've seen such a change in Jose lately... I am absolutely impressed by him =)

Well everyone pray for me and I will updat as soon as I feel up to it...
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/50756.html

So I went to the Orthopedist yesterday about my ankle thinking I was just getting a cast when he tells me I have to get surgery so they can put pins in my ankle... so now I'm just like scared and just an emotional mess... I'll be out of work until about March 3rd (I think) and School until March 9th... and after the surgery I'll be in a hard cast and on crutches for a while... the surgery is on Friday .. anyone who cares feel free to come by and keep me company or whatever... I'm no longer gonna ask anyone for help because it's become very clear to me that nobody really cares enough about me to do that... but that's ok because when I'm healed i now know who not to invest time in anymore... I didn't intend on this being some life altering event but that's what has happened unfortunately... I'm not really in the mood to chit chat and stuff because I'm really depressed right now... so I was just throwing this out for just to let everyone know what my deal is... thanks =)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/50613.html

~oopurplegirl7oo~


LJ friendsCollage. Brought to you by and .
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/50224.html

So last night I attended a sleepover at Chris Ryan's in order to relieve some of the stresses of this past week.. I had like 2 drinks.. definately NOT drunk.. I decided I wanted to go outside and have a cigarette and I missed the step going into his porch and fucking fell and when I fell I heard a snap... but i convinced myself i just sprained the bitch and figured I'd throw some ice on the bitch and wake up in the AM and it would be fine... so in the middle of the night I had to pee 2 times and I couldn't even walk to the bathroom without assistance (thanks so much CJ and Chris!).. so by about 6:30 AM the pain had gotten to be too much to take so I woke Randy up (so sorry babe) and asked him to bring me to the ER so he woke the other boys up and they conferred on what to do... Chris Patrick decided I should go to his Mom's urgent care place because the ER would take really long so I was OK with that so we stopped at the pancake house first (where I hopped in on 1 foot and got stared at) then went.. I waited for about 3 hours total but was told the bitch was broken... they didn't even have crutches there... so they gave me and air cast and told me to call an orthopedist on Monday and make an appointment for ASAP to get my real cast because i couldn't do it today cause my nakle was too swollen... so then I had to run around and borrow some crutches from my aunt and like fill my prescriptions... but my uncle fed me some good ass meatloaf so that made me happy... so I got home and relazied I couldn't even carry my shit in.. so Greg stopped by to bring in my shit (thanks soooooooo much hun)... and now I'm chillen... but anyone who wants to stop by or just call to occupy me would be greatly appreciated... I'm so sad my nice little 3 day weekend is ruined! I soooooo wanted to go to Avalon.. .damn it!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/49977.html
*I wish that for every time you told me you love me that you actually meant it*
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/49779.html

How is it possible a person many people know and love can die on 2/7 and nobody finds out until today 2/14 .... are we all that selfish and uncaring that nobody has talked to this kid at all in a week... hell on the 10th people posted comments on his myspace page saying he died.. did not one of us look at his page since then??? this just points out to me personally that I'm not the great friend I thought.. or the nice person i once thought... I'm very far from perfection and have a very long way to go... what I do know right now as I sit here crying is that I WILL treat people better so matter what I think of them... so Adam you were loved and truly will be missed RIP....
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/49518.html

Well here's a quick re-cap.... so for a few days I lost my voice and my throat was all fucked up so I went to the doctor and it turned out I had bronchitis.. so I got medicine that cost $100!!!!! I was pissed about that shit.... plus this medicine makes me mad fucked up like I'm on drugs... which sucked for Saturday at work because I was so dizzy and out of it and my medicine was making me all dehydrated so I need to go get some water so I told my boss Jake and he rolled his eyes at me.... between being sick and that it set me off and I went in thr bathroom and cried to my Mom.... so after work Jake offered to buy a round of drinks so I went.. me and Jake were the last ones to leave so we got to talking and I'm glad cause he's really not as bad as I thought and he even appoligized to me... 

So yeah I bought Chris Ryan 2 shirts from Abercrombie for a Valentine's Day/Thank you present... I think certain people aren't happy about this but in my defense Chris has done more for me in the past month than anyone has in the past year... I have not been in the greatest spirits lately but Chris has helped me to smile... so if i seem to favor him so what.. maybe I do... it's not about how long you know someone.. it's about how well you know them... so basically Chris deserves to be spoiled sometimes... so if people don't like it get over it....

We went to Heaven last night (me, Randy, Chris, AJ, and Matt) ... it was OK except for the drama.. I got pretty wasted.... I actually lost my phone in AJ's car and passed out on my living room floor in the clothes I went out in... I woke up and puked up sex on the beaches ... LMAO

Tommorrow is the dreaded Valentine's Day.. I sorta have a Valentine but not really.. I'm working all day anyways and my Valentine has a Valentine so I won't even see them... but to keep it real there'a always the little part of me that hopes somebody has a secret crush on me and will send me flowers at work or soemthing... but being a realistic person I know this won't happen


well that's it for now.. leave some comments.... my journal is neglected
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/49407.html

So yeah I finally found someone I totally fell for.. like for real..... and it sucks it had to be this person..... I'm  a mess over them... this person is more than amazing... there are no words to describe how much this person means to me.. they know who they are... I love you baby =)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/49115.html

I'm soooo tired of lying about my feelings just to mask the truth... I want to just be honest but really I can't... it would totally fuck shit up!


Lying just isn't my style but for once I think I'm doin the right thing... and that's what matters...
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/48713.html
Is it sooooooo bad to want some one to need me???
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/48554.html

Tonight me and Matt were walking into feathers and somebody screamed my name.. so I waited and they drove by and threw an egg at me!... LMAO .... I mean I laughed about it... because damn you must really HATE me to throw an egg at me...  like  I know if I HATE someone it because I'm  kinda jealous... so I must be important if someone is that jealous to throw a fucking egg... haha.. Bring on the eggs... I want an omellette!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/48319.html

What an awesome night @ Colo... I wish I could've seen Matt more but he was socializing a lot and I wanted to dance.... but yeah I GOT TO KISS GREG! .... LMAO ... who would've ever thought... but Greg is funny like that.... Hope your birthday was fun my sweets =)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/48075.html

The more and more I have worked on making myself into who I wanna be the more I have realized that girls are absolutely insane... I know because I am one and used to be just as crazy... but the more I've matured and grown as a person the more I realize that it is not what I want to be... I actually have learned to respect how guys are so NOT insane and have strived to be more like that... Let's go over some examples:

1. My ex girl and her new girl once smashed in my back windshield of my car (damn what did my car do to them?)
2. My friend Bryan from work brought his girl to a strip club and asked if it was OK if he got a lap dance...  she said yes... then afterwards she contemplated dumping him cause it bothered her (Bitch why  did you say yes then?)
3. I gave my number to the kid I sit next to at work... we're friends... that's it!.... his ex-girl found it and burned it (Damn bitch I see him like everyday burning my # ain't doin shit and you burned it?... you couldn't have just thrown it away?)
4. I chat online w/ this kid Brian.. just as friends... he's my friend on myspace and shit.. so his ex-girl writes to me basically cause she swears I like him or something... which I don't because I never LIKE anyone! (bitch your his ex anyway.... what do you care who he talks to?)

so yeah I think that sums it up right there.... it's because of things like this that make it hard to be a bi-sexual girl... because really I hate girls... I guess this is why I hang around w/ a bunch of boys... because this kind of psycho drama is really ridiculous and annoying....

I mean I LOVE girls... they're beautiful but how will I ever meet a decent one when they all do things of this nature?????
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/47702.html

- Carl ... your best just doesn't seem good enough
- Christopher Mc.Carthy has a heart of gold
- Greg seems to be the only person I take advice from =)
- I miss my Matteo .... sooooooo much
- I need a motherfucking Valentine!!!!!!!

Thursday is Greg's B-day so everyone best come out on Wednesday and Thursday to party it up with him!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/47507.html

So Saturday I was supposed to work from 9-5 but I left at one because of the blizzard.... so I went home got ready and headed over to Chris Ryan's house because I'd rather be snowed in over there than alone in my house (damn you Matt for not being at my house!)... when I got there Chris P. and Anthony (AJ) were there.... so we headed out to A&P to get some food and crap..... so we got back and ate and drank and watched movies... later on Greg came over and that made it even better.... I wish Matt, CJ, and Randy had been there too... then it would have been perfect! But all in all I had fun and I love my boys!... here's some pics from last night =)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/47196.html

So last night I went to Feathers w/ my usual boys... and let's just say I got a little more drunk than I usually do... and let's just say I grabbed a few crotches... and now I just feel really shitty about it.... like the boys tried to be nice and act like they didn't care but I'd totally care if it was me... I'm mad that I did that.... I have to watch not to get drunk in the future cause it's times like this when I get ashamed of myself and start avoiding people and I really don't want to avoid these boys cause I love them so much :(
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/47083.html

Well this weekend has been pretty cool.... I spent most of it with my boys.... On Friday I worked all day then just stayed in and Jose came over and watched a movie... then on Saturday I worked till 5 then took a nap... then Shane and Matt came over for a sleppover.... then on Sunday me and Matt (my hubby) ran errands and shit then we went to Jason's B-day party thingie (we were about an hour and a half late) then we hit up Avalon... Greg, AJ, BJ, Chris, Ben, Carl, Allan, and Jimmy were also there... oh yeah and Jose.... but he was actin shady so whatever man.... Jose's ex Diego was there... he was adorable... I love him now..lol ... but yeah it was this kid Tim's b-day... poor kid couldn't even stand but hey that's how you know you had a good b-day.... some white bitch was wasted and was like all over Chris... what a dumb girl... he doesn't even like the pussy.... but yeah everytime someone tried to like get her away she would jump on them.. she even jumped on me... at one point I got soooo mad I pulled her hair.. but she thought it was Chris flirting... lol... but i ended up saving him in the end... he was happy... but he returned the favor cause some skeevy guy was all up on my shit and he saved me... I ♥ Chris soooooooo much! So then me and Matt came home and cuddled and passed the fuck out.... we woke up and watched Dodgeball and played the Sims.... it was a good motherfucking weekend.... So I decided I really haven't written about Matt too much so I'd like to talk about him now.. I actually met Matt 2 years ago through Carl... we both go to Ramapo and at that time so did Carl... so one day Carl invited me to lunch with Matt and some other peeps.. so I went and I didn't like the kid.... so I saw him again over the summer at Gay Pride and still didn't like him... lol ... but then when we started chillen at Colo I saw him all the time... but from chillen with him there I finally started to like him.. and since then we started chillen more and more and now I love him.... he's my best friend.... and he's introduced me to the most amazing people in the world.. I'm so grateful.... the reason I like Matt soooo much is cause he's not fake at all... he always keeps it real..... I chill with him at LEAST 2 times a week.... and NEVER have we had issues... plus he's a fucking cunt like me and he hates everyone like I do.. so we relate to each other a lot.... another great thing about Matt is he's a GREAT cuddler.... there's nothing I like to do more than cuddle with Matt... (and to all you stupid people who are thinking.. damn she likes this kid... I don't.. I like him as a best friend.. he's gay) .... but I think Matt is just really misunderstood and once you get past his front he has a really big heart that few get to see... he's just amazing.... so if you ever get to meet him.... talk to him.. it's worth it... I ♥ you my Matt (my hubby)
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/46809.html
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/46492.html

2 boys I must see on a daily basis that have girlfriends have physically told me that they would like to fuck me.... 1 I would fuck if he was single the other one I just wouldn't.... but what is this thing with me and the taken guys... it's been this way for years... Ed knows all about it... it's like I'm that girl every guy is like "damn she's mad cool and what I would like in a girl but why have her be my girl if I could get what I want without that" .... well boys I'm NOT that girl anymore... sure we can be friends but you can give up on any hope that you'll ever get in my pants... I'm better than that .... one day someone normal and single will actually like me.... I know it =)

oh and I got a raise today ... woo-hoo!
http://oopurplegirl7oo.livejournal.com/46271.html

I hardly know you

Well it's now 7:38 AM and I can't sleep because it's Christmas..... I remember being a little kid and waking up mad early to open girfts. I know you're all thinking, "Corinne, you're a Jew" .... but my dad was Catholic so when we actually talked I would always spend Christmases at his house. It used to be soooo much fun.... on Christmas Eve we would stay up real late listening to Christmas music and eating Christmas cookies... then on Christmas day my dad would wake me up all early to open my girfts... and my Dad always got the best gifts. Then we would go to my Grandma's for a party with the rest of my fam. I was usually the only kid there and they would all tell dirty jokes in Polish so I couldn't understand. My Aunt Marla always made this rice cake that was out of this world! Then my Dad would bring me home and I'd get to show my Mom all the cool presents I got.... Damn I really miss those days

I mean not even Hannukah is cool.... it used to be my fam all got together at my Uncle Steven's and we'd all exchange gifts there and eat.... but ever since my Pop-Pop died the fam just doesn't really speak so they all do their own things I guess.... I'm nevere invited to functions because I think the Fam sometimes forgets that my Mom is all the way in Texas and that I no longer speak to my father. Even Thanksgiving is pretty bad. I don't even get crads for my birthday.

So as I've gotten older I've begun to really hate ALL holidays.. it's just not the same as it used to be.. it's days like this I actually miss my father.. I wish for once in his life he could act like a real man and take responsibility for his mistakes.... I mean I am his ONLY child! How dare he be upset with me for saying he wasn't a good Dad when he wasn't. I mean any man who leaves his 10 year old child waiting for them to pick them up and never shows on a weekly basis isn't so great. Any man who constantly talks crap about their childs Mom isn't such a great man....

Yet he is my Father....and I guess just for that reason I will always have some love for him
